title: “Forgotten Founder,” William E. Blackstone, is Remembered by Biola University (Biola University)
text: ( Source : Biola University ) LA MIRADA, CALIF. - Biola University will dedicate the newest residence hall -William E. Blackstone Hall - on Tuesday Oct. 6, 2015 at 10:30 a.m. in the dorm's courtyard. The residence hall is named after Biola 's
